main event: Private pilot Kenneth Arnold reported seeing 9 disc-like crafts flying at an estimated speed of 1,200 mph on June 24, 1947.
interesting points: The crafts were observed flying in a chain formation with erratic motion,The observer was flying at an altitude of approximately 9,500 feet,The sighting occurred under clear visibility and bright sunlight conditions,There were no other confirmed witnesses to the event,The report is part of the Project Blue Book investigation by the U.S. Air Force.
